welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Amelia, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer and making unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky Airport, primarily used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati Municipal-Lunken Field Airport provides services for commercial, private, and military flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cincinnati Municipal-Lunken Field Airport offers exclusive services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
